casebody.data:
Dorette B. SHIRLEY, Appellant,
v.
BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, as Indenture Trustee FOR NEWCASTLE MORTGAGE SECURITIES TRUST 2006-1, Appellee. Case No. 2D17-2802 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed March 14, 2018.

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
